issue.title: [Gandiva] Enable building with gcc 4.8.x on Ubuntu Trusty, similar distros
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3501](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3501). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Gandiva has a dependency on gcc 4.9 - causes a link error with gcc 4.8. Investigate and remove this dependency if possible.
